title: New Champion Select
body:
Hi,
{{summoner:6}}  I was just wondering when is New Champion select coming out. Was expecting it on patch 5.23 but its not there yet.

replies.body: I believe it is going live on NA and one of the other servers first for testing, we aren't first on the list this time :) Expect it sometime during preseason, but not necessarily any time real soon. Probably late december, maybe after snowdown ends.
I'm sooooooooooo keen for it. Mainly just the Team Builder part
its not even back on PBE yet
